comment._content:
Lincoln: un verdadero presidente.

Saludos United States of America.

comment.author: 89157585@N00
comment._content:
Abraham Lincoln lived every moment of his 56 years with a thoughtfulness of others always in his heart. His wife supported him and encouraged him throughout his career. She suffered the losses of many close to her and suffered grief that no parent  nor wife should have to go through. She was not insane. Grief stricken yes. Today we have access to therapies that years ago they had nothing for. I believe she was his anchor and his mentor. And he hers.
I think he had a wonderful life full of meaning, challenge and adventure.
